We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private UltimateOscillator _ultosc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ultosc = ULTOSC(symbol, period1, period2, period3);

// In OnData()
if (_ultosc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Current", _ultosc.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ultosc = self.ULTOSC(symbol, period1, period2, period3)

# In OnData()
if self.ultosc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ULTOSC Current", self.ultosc.Current);
